idea-plugin.name: QiCodeGenerator
idea-plugin.description: This plugin is for generating codes for entities. With a bean defined with Entity annotation, use it the following classes such as Dao/Repository/DTO/Service/ServiceImpl/Query/ Controller/Mapper would be created automatically. Basic functions like add/update/delete/simple query would be contained in these auto generated classes. Additionally, a mybatis mapping file would be created in the directory of resources/mappers, with elements of 'resultMap' and other useful sqls. After installation, a new menu item would be created in the 'Window' menu. You must promise that the class opened in the editor with the annotation of Entity, or nothing would happen after you click the menu item.
